name: Roast Chicken
---
1 whole chicken
3 tsp salt
2 tsp black pepper

; coat, fridge for 1 day


150g carrots, chopped
2 onions, chopped
3 stalks celery, chopped
150g fingerling potato, chopped
4 cloves garlic
4 tsp olive oil
; mix, add to pan
; put chicken on to, 350F till done

1 tsp lemon juice
1/2 bunch parsley, chopped
; finish
